nodes.text: Ava Seldin was a Human female Imperial scientist during the time of the Galactic War.

Around 3641 BBY, she was stationed on Belsavis where she formed a series of domination experiments that the Galactic Republic conducted in order find out the strengths and weaknesses of various alien species. While trying to recover the information, her guard attachment was attacked and wiped out by prisoners. Hoping that the Republic's research would give her invaluable insight into the capabilities of the studied alien species, she tasked an Imperial spacer to retrieve the research data.
